text: Thaumatichthys is a genus of wolftrap anglers consisting of three species. They are called wonderfish. One unusual feature is that their esca is in their gaping mouth instead of their heads. == Species == * Thaumatichthys axeli Bruun, 1953 (Prince Axel's wonderfish) * Thaumatichthys binghami A. E. Parr, 1927 * Thaumatichthys pagidostomus H. M. Smith & Radcliffe, 1912 == References == # Hinton, Sam. "Trapjaw anglerfish: Thaumatichthys pagidostomus (illustration from "The Ocean World")". UC San Diego. Retrieved 4 September 2024. Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Thaumatichthys
